Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Reroute at Lawrence/Leclaire
ShortDescription: 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Lovejoy, Foster, Cicero and Lawrence: due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Leclaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Lovejoy, Foster, Cicero and Lawrence: due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Leclaire.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Racine. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Racine.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
